text: Steve Satterfield is a former American football coach and player. He served as the head football coach at Wofford College from 1974 until his retirement in 1976, compiling a record of 18–14–1. As a college football player, he was the starting quarterback at the University of South Carolina in 1959. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Clemson Tigers football coaches Category:South Carolina Gamecocks football players Category:Wofford Terriers football coaches Category:High school football coaches in South Carolina
title: Steve Satterfield
